5.plot: Jimmy Clausen has a message for Pizzi, Troy Aikman sits down on 'A Slice of Pizzi', and Anna Rawson works as Michelle's caddy.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Pizzi travels to Philly, Bernie thinks monkeys help security and John Malkovich visits 'A Slice of Pizzi'.

13.title: Episode #2.13
13.plot: Pizzi goes back to school, Bikini Girls recites LeBron's decision, Michelle goes on a date with Judah Friedlander, and Tony Hawk skates by to have a Slice with Pizzi.

14.title: Episode #2.14
14.plot: Mark Wahlberg wraps for Pizzi, we put a hidden camera on Playboy cover model Arianny Celeste, our Strip Teacher explains the origin of the Heisman Trophy, and Nikki Benz talks fantasy football.

15.title: Episode #2.15
15.plot: Nikki Benz shows off her GM knowledge, Gary Baba Booey Dell'abate face to face with Pizzi, and our Bikini Girls reenact Jim Grey and Pete Rose infamous interview.

16.title: Episode #2.16
16.plot: Bernie and Pizzi get Christmas cards from famous athletes while Michelle gets a small present from Brett Favre himself, and the Strip Teacher is back to tell us the origin of Santa.

17.title: Episode #2.17
17.plot: Pizzi teaches Bernie and Michelle a new way to ring in the New Year with the help of his Pissed Off Cousin, and the Strip Teacher teaches the crew the meaning of "Auld Lang Syne".

18.title: Episode #2.18
18.plot: Pizzi learns how to read and is surprised to find out "new" information on Johnny Weir; Nikki Benz tells the crew the truth out Power Balance bracelets, and Michelle shows off her fly-dancing past.

21.title: Episode #2.21
21.plot: Bernie and Michelle rush through work in an attempt to get to Dallas for the Super Bowl while Pizzi surprises them with a gift they'll never forget.

22.title: Episode #2.22
22.plot: Once in Dallas, Bernie and Michelle find out Pizzi's tickets are no good and try out their own ways of getting into the Super Bowl; Pizzi gets a tip from Jerry Jones, and our cleaning explains the shortage in Dallas.

23.title: Episode #2.23
23.plot: It's "Love Week" at the office and Nascar shows it's "love" for Pizzi; also Pau Gasol teaches Pizzi some post-up moves.

24.title: Episode #2.24
24.plot: Bernie and Pizzi have their own ideas on what the "Magic Bird Show" could bring to Broadway; and surf legend Kelly Slater stops by "A Slice of Pizzi".

25.plot: Michelle auditions for a MLB Dream Job, the Bikini Lines girls have a natural reaction to a loss, and Pizzi makes a deal with Wayne Brady.

32.plot: Bernie and Pizzi try to get some extra help with their new "Madden 12: The Lockout" commercial, Jeffrey Tambor stops by "A Slice of Pizzi", and the office lobby turns into a piano bar.

33.title: Episode 82
33.plot: Willis McGahee stops by to show Bernie some "Dream"-like dance moves, Pizzi trains Michelle for a hot dog eating contest, and Chris Jericho shows a real slice on "A Slice of Pizzi."

34.title: Episode 83
34.plot: Snacks Lee comes back to give the group a sports report, Joseph Gordon-Levitt gives Pizzi a tattoo on "A Slice of Pizzi", and our Cleaning Lady, Nikki Benz, gets a surprise visit from the Green Men.

35.title: Episode 84
35.plot: Pizzi and Bernie lap dance their way to an entertaining Thursday at the office, the group bonds over crying about ridiculous things, and Jesse "The Body" Ventura tells Pizzi about the CIA watch-list.

imdb.title: Cubed
plot: "_Cubed_ (qv)" follows three office drones - Michelle, Pizzi, and Bernie - as they kill time at their cubicles discussing sports and pop culture as well as original skits and hilarious videos.::Anonymous
